overview: Seven years ago, a man convinced Lucifer was within him brutally murdered his wife and child. Now, Eric and Hayley move into the same house after years of being left unsold on the market. They think they got a good deal with the house, a bargain in fact. But what they don't know is that evil still lurks within the house and is awaiting more souls to take.
tagline: A couple move into a new family house to settle down with their little girl to discover evil lurks awaiting more victims.
title: Lucifer's Night
